pr_title: ArC - support synthetic observer methods added at build time

timeline.bodyText: Hmm if we want to have this unique, we could append object hash of the ObserverInfo object? Something like that instead of listing the params. Depends on whether we want to have it human-readable or unique :)
timeline.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText: Ah, sorry. It should be unique and it should not contain any random element so that it only changes if you change the source. I'm not sure it's 100% needed but use a similar strategy for bean classes where it's definitely needed.
replies.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText:
Oh, I see what you mean.
I recall we had one issue where synthetic bean re-generated in between tests was already loaded in the CL in its own version. So I suppose this is going to be the same, right?
It was a rare case but I don't think we anyhow solved that (e.g. made it unique on a per-build basis).
replies.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText: BTW it might be worth adding something along those lines to the javadoc (of both, observer and bean).
replies.author: manovotn

timeline.bodyText: I am thinking this might deserve an ObserverRegistrar instead of merging it into BeanRegistrar.
timeline.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText: Well, it would be more correct and so but in fact, I'd rather rename the BeanRegistrar to ComponentRegistrar... but this would require some compatibility tweaks.
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText: Good catch! This could even fail with NPE!
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.bodyText: This will be user facing API, can we have some more verbose javadoc please?
timeline.author: manovotn

replies.bodyText: @mkouba You know the drill - lorem ipsum ... :-D
replies.author: manovotn

timeline.bodyText: Smaller class names mean smaller JARs 😉 Maybe use the abbreviation Syn?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Well, this is what I call a premature optimization 😄. No seriously the readability is IMHO much more important in this case.
replies.author: mkouba

timeline.message:
ArC - support synthetic observer methods added at build time

- resolves #6879

Add SyntheticObserverTest

- also rename io.quarkus.arc.test.build.extension to
io.quarkus.arc.test.buildextension to avoid problems with the global
gitignore file
Fix possible NPEs in ObserverInfo, add javadoc to QualifierConfigurator
ObserverRegistrar - a dedicated extension point for synthetic observers
